item.title: The Ear Demands Some Variety
item.description: I don’t recall where I first ran across this sound advice, but I’ve referred to it many times over the years. Transcribed thanks to GPT-4-Vision. üòâ ‚ÄúThis sentence has five words. Here are five more words. Five-word sentences are fine. But several together are monotonous. Listen to what is happening. The writing is getting boring. The sound of it drones. It‚Äôs like a stuck record. The ear demands some variety.

item.title: What's on My Desk 2024
item.description: I’ve arguably spent way too much time tweaking and futzing my home office setup. Here’s where I’m at. Desk 30‚Äù x 60‚Äù Javis Powdercoated Standing Desk in black by Fully. I don‚Äôt think they make this particular model anymore but it‚Äôs perfect for me, especially after adding big, rubbery wheels for rolling on and not destroying our hardwood floors. Chair A classic Herman Miller Aeron Chair which I‚Äôve had for nearly 20 years.
